teacherlanding.title: Scratch - skolotājiem
teacherlanding.intro: Tavi skolēni var izmantot Scratch, lai kodētu pašiem savus stāstus, animācijas un spēles. Veidošanas procesā, viņi iemācās domāt radoši, sistemātiski plānot un strādāt kopā — galvenās prasmes visiem šodienas sabiedrība.
teacherlanding.generalUsageGradeLevels: Skolās: pamatskolās, vidusskolās un augstskolās (arī dažās koledžās!)
teacherlanding.generalUsageSubjectAreas: Jomas: valodās, zinātnēs, sociālajās zinībās, matemātikā, datorzinībās, svešvalodās un mākslā
teacherlanding.scratchEdDescription: ScratchEd ir tiešsaistes kopiena, kur Scratch skolotāji dalās ar stāstiem, mainās ar resursiem, uzdod jautājumus un atrod cilvēkus. ScratchEd izstrādāja un atbalstīja Harvarda absolventu skola.
teacherlanding.meetupDescription: Scratch Educator Meetups are gatherings of Scratch Educators who want to learn with and from each other, sharing their ideas and strategies for supporting computational creativity in all its forms.
teacherlanding.tttPage: The Tips page offers a variety of tutorials, activity cards, and educator guides.
teacherlanding.tipsWindow: The Tips Window provides help for creating projects in Scratch.
teacherlanding.creativeComputing: The Creative Computing Curriculum Guide provides plans, activities, and strategies for introducing creative computing.
teacherlanding.accountsDescription: As an educator, you can request a Scratch Teacher Account, which makes it easier to create accounts for groups of students and to manage your students’ projects and comments. To learn more, see the Teacher Account FAQ page.
